CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 23, 1946, pg. 15 reads: "Swing Your Partner - The barn dance at Hill City, youth municipality, last week was the real McCoy, with many friends of the institution on hand to enjoy the fun. This is just one of the events sponsored by Hill City to curb juvenile delinquency and to improve race relations. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Man wearing dark suit, and young men and women, dancing in couples, in small ballroom of Hill City with three piece band during barn dance
